extensionName.description: The name of the extension, displayed in the web store and browser.

extensionDescription.message: Generate a collapsible table of contents for web pages, supports CSS selector configuration, and provides element picker. Click extension icon to enable/disable per site.
extensionDescription.description: A short description of the extension's purpose and features.

browserActionTitle.description: The tooltip text displayed when hovering over the extension's icon in the browser toolbar.

tocTitle.description: Short text for Table of Contents

buttonCollapse.description: Button text to collapse the TOC panel

buttonRefresh.description: Button text to refresh the TOC

buttonPickElement.description: Button text to activate element picker

buttonPickElementTitle.message: Click then select an element on the page to generate a selector

buttonManageSave.description: Button text to manage saved configurations

buttonManageSaveTitle.message: View/Clear saved selectors for current site

emptyTocMessage.message: No TOC items found. Try refreshing the page or clicking the Refresh button.
emptyTocMessage.description: Message displayed when no TOC items are found

badgeTitle.description: Tooltip for the collapsed badge button

pickerResultTitle.description: Title of the picker result dialog

buttonSaveAsConfig.description: Button text to save selector as site configuration

configDialogTitle.description: Title of the configuration management dialog

configNoSelectors.description: Text displayed when no selectors are saved

buttonClearConfig.description: Button text to clear site configuration

errorOperationFailed.message: Operation failed. Please check the console.

logMissingDependencies.description: Error message when dependencies are missing

logNoConfigFound.message: No configuration found, starting panel with default empty config
logNoConfigFound.description: Debug message when no config is found

logConfigMatched.description: Debug message when configuration is matched

logContentScriptStarted.description: Debug message when content script starts

logSiteDisabled.message: Current site is disabled, panel not initialized
logSiteDisabled.description: Debug message when site is disabled

logReadEnabledFailed.message: Failed to read enabled state, defaulting to disabled
logReadEnabledFailed.description: Warning message when reading enabled state fails

logReadConfigFailed.message: Failed to read latest config, using memory state
logReadConfigFailed.description: Warning message when reading config fails

logSavePositionFailed.description: Warning message when saving position fails

logSaveConfigFailed.description: Error message when saving config fails

logClearConfigFailed.description: Error message when clearing config fails
